short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple new tab extension that shows your websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upgrade your browsing experience with a clean, minimalist new tab interface. The Simple New Tab extension replaces clutter with simplicity, featuring:
⭐️ Quick Access: 
Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites with customizable shortcut icons
⭐️ Time and Date Display: 
Stay on top of your schedule with an elegant clock and date display
⭐️ Light & Dark Modes: 
Switch seamlessly between light and dark themes to suit your preference or environment.
⭐️ Customizable:   
Add, remove, or reorder shortcuts to make the new tab truly yours.

No distractions, just functionality and style. Perfect for anyone who loves a clean and organized browsing experience.
Download now and make your new tab simple again!
